name: They Got In
description:
In a future where people have become the technology. Being hacked becomes the most dangerous event ever. This time it happened to you, and your chances of survival are zero.

Built during Mini Jam 15.
Theme - Technology
Limitation - Color Palette

https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-15-technology

Credits:

Game Design, Game & UI Programming:
        Renaud Marshall

Sound and Music:
        Thomas Dimitri - Strikecast Audio
        
Art:
        Akusan
        
Font:
        Cyberfunk by John Gauthier
